bug.author: cclauss
bug.description:
flake8 testing of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy>https://github.com/explosion/spaCy</denchmark-link> on Python 2.7.13 $ flake8 . --count --select=E901,E999,F821,F822,F823 --show-source --statistics <denchmark-code>./bin/parser/conll_train.py:142:12: F821 undefined name 'eval_only' if not eval_only: ^
./bin/parser/train.py:116:17: F821 undefined name '_merge_sents' sents = _merge_sents(sents) ^
./spacy/deprecated.py:15:18: F821 undefined name 'read_prefix' prefix = read_prefix(file_) if file_ is not None else None ^
./spacy/deprecated.py:17:18: F821 undefined name 'read_suffix' suffix = read_suffix(file_) if file_ is not None else None ^
./spacy/deprecated.py:19:17: F821 undefined name 'read_infix' infix = read_infix(file_) if file_ is not None else None ^ </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
